name: Pickled Fruit Pursuit
description: Have you ever wanted to save the world while settling petty squabbles? Well now you can! Pickled Fruit Pursuit is the turn-based RPG that lets you decide the type of adventure you’re up for today. Will you take on elite guards or spend that hard-earned bread in the shop? Only you can decide the best way to defeat the forces of Picklemancer and Souron!
